thread.title: BRIEF-STMicroelectronics advanced sensors integrated in OnePlus 2 Phone
thread.title_full: BRIEF-STMicroelectronics advanced sensors integrated in OnePlus 2 Phone | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-STMicroelectronics advanced sensors integrated in OnePlus 2 Phone
text:
Sept 8 Stmicroelectronics NV :
* Says its advanced motion and proximity sensors have been integrated in OnePlus 2, the newest smartphone from a Chinese mobile maker Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
